entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -21.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 1:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -21.5°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %

Dewpoint: -27.3°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:43 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 1:43 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:43 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
